    • Field Detail

      • SHOW_MAIN_HELP_SCREEN_EXIT_CODE

        public static final int SHOW_MAIN_HELP_SCREEN_EXIT_CODE
        This return code tells calling code (i.e. in Main) that the main help screen should be shown. Actual value chosen to be distinct from actual shell error codes
